♢About:

This style will complete override We Heart It previous design. It will darken many elements, change overlays to transparent and minimalist styles and make the feed images larger, without space between and taking 95% of the site once you scroll down.

♢Notes:
Finally I rewrote the code, I changed some few things, made it more flat and darker, will specify details later.

♢Known-issues:

Maybe some pages and elements still need to be altered , check for updates.
